column1: This movie is sooooo nice!! I should watch it twice.
Absolutely loved the soundtrack, it fit perfectly.
One of the best films I’ve seen this year!
Amazing visuals, the cinematography is stunning.
I wouldn’t recommend it, felt too long and slow.
Not worth the hype, kind of disappointing.
The story didn’t make sense, left me confused.
It was painful to sit through, very disappointing.
